Reviews.Title: IT IS WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR IN A CAMERA.  THE PRICE WAS WHAT IS COULD AFFORD AND IT WAS SHIPPED QUICKLY.
Reviews.Author: Barbara S. Heurich
Reviews.Content: IT WAS THE CAMERA I WAS LOOKING FOR WITH ALL THE FEATURES I NEEDED.  THE PRICE WAS VERY NICE AND IT ARRIVED IN A VERY TIMELY MANNER

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: katty alessandra
Reviews.Content: i had to return it because a malfunction in the SD card reader. sometimes it works and sometimes it does not.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Alex P
Reviews.Content: No complaints. Package was shipped on time. Price was great. Product is like new. Have had 0 issues with it. A great camera for me to start on DSLR photography.

Reviews.Title: Awesome First Purchase on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Sharad Mitra
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have purchased anything on Amazon and recently online, I would say my experience was amazing and smooth from searching an item on the website, getting the details of the item to finally receiving the item and the item itself.The camera details and status of the camera is exactly same and I am happy that I opted Amazon to do my purchases done.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon's CMOS sensor captures images with exceptional clarity and tonal range and offers the most pixels in its class. It offers many of the same new technologies to maximize each pixel's light gathering efficiency that were first seen with the professional EOS-1D Mark III model
The improved DIGIC 4 Image Processor ensures that images are captured, processed and saved with remarkable speed
The EOS Rebel T3 DSLR's new 3:2 multiple aspect ratio, in-camera RAW image processing, creative filters, image resizing and provided S2 and S3 image-recording quality are all possible thanks to the DIGIC 4 Image Processor
DIGIC 4 Image Processor also works to capture and process data of images shot at 12.2 Megapixels at 3.0 fps, as well as 14-bit signal processing for excellent image gradation, enhanced Face Detection Live mode, Full HD video recording, Auto Lighting Optimizer and Lens Peripheral Optimization
With a broad range of ISO settings, the EOS Rebel T3 enables shooting from sunrise to sunset and helps ensure capture of the finest detail
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens - Refurbished
